title: 803: PRESIDENT BUKELE PREDICTS BITCOIN $100K RALLY, MORE COUNTIRES TO ADOPT BTC AS LEGAL TENDER AND MORE!
description:
On Jan 2, El Salvador President Nayib Bukele shared 5 bullish Bitcoin predictions on BTC performance for 2022.

"2022 predictions on Bitcoin:

Will reach $100k
2 more countries will adopt it as legal tender
Will become a major electoral issue in US elections this year
Bitcoin City will commence construction
Volcano bonds will be oversubscribed
Huge surprise at TheBitcoinConf"

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
